programme.desc: Lucky Day: Alvin's luck goes from bad to worse after Theodore finds a four-leaf clover and everything starts going his way.

programme.desc: Runaway McBride: Howard and Harold tear their home apart after Clyde starts spending more time with the gang and less time at home. (S5, ep 25a)

programme.title: The Loud House
programme.desc: Snow News Day: When there are signs of a yeti in Royal Woods, the Action News Team sets out to prove its existence. (S6, ep 23b)

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: Mr Krabs joins in a game of treasure hunt with SpongeBob and Patrick In 'Arrgh!', while in 'Rock Bottom' SpongeBob gets on the wrong bus and finds himself in a strange town. (S1, ep 17)

programme.desc: A secret snack experiment has monstrous side effects in 'Midnight Snack Attack', then in 'Hot Pearl-tato', Mr. Krabs needs to find a babysitter for Pearl, but she proves too much to handle. (S1, ep 6)

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: In 'Nature Pants' SpongeBob decides to try and live life with the jellyfish, and in 'Opposite Day' Squidward tries to sell his house despite his annoying neighbours.

programme.desc: SpongeBob takes Mr. Krab's daughter to her prom in 'The Chaperone' and in 'Employee Of The Month' SpongeBob thinks that the award might go to Squidward instead of him. (S1, ep 12)

programme.title: Tomos a'i Ffrindau
programme.desc: Anturiaethau Tomos a'i ffrindiau. The adventures of Tomos and friends.

programme.title: Anifeiliaid Bach y Byd

programme.title: Guto Gwningen
programme.desc: Mae Guto'n dod o hyd i allwedd wedi ei chuddio yn llyfr mawr pwysig ei dad. Guto finds a mysterious key hidden in his father's journal and is determined to find out what it fits.

programme.title: Amser Maith Maith yn ôl
programme.desc: Stori o adeg y Rhyfel Byd Cyntaf sydd gan Tadcu heddiw. Mae Tomi a Gwen wedi bod yn gofalu am lysiau ar gyfer y gystadleuaeth arddio. Grandad has a story from the First World War today.

programme.title: Odo
programme.desc: Cartwn hyfryd am gwdihw bach o'r enw Odo a'i ffrindiau yn y goedwig. Lovely cartoon about a little owl called Odo and his woodland friends.

programme.title: Pablo
programme.desc: Mae gan Pablo ei ffordd ei hun o weld y byd. Mae'n rhaid iddo stopio'r Llowciwr Oglau rhag llyncu popeth! Pablo and friends stop The Smell Gobbler eating all the smells in the house.

programme.title: New: Annibendod
programme.desc: Mae cerdyn post o Hawaii gan Wncwl Wil yn ysbrydoli Anni a Lili i ail greu Hawaii yn y gegin! A postcard from Hawaii from Uncle Wil inspires Anni and Lili to create Hawaii in the kitchen!

programme.title: Pentre Papur Pop
programme.desc: Ar yr antur popwych heddiw mae Huwcyn yn gwneud ffrind bach newydd. Ond pan mae Crawcyn angen lle i fyw, all Huwcyn wneud un iddo? On today's pop adventure, Hooper makes a froggy friend.

programme.title: Sigldigwt
programme.desc: Mae Gwesty Sigldigwt ar agor! Heddiw cawn gwrdd â Dilys y cocyrpw ac Aneira a'i chrwbanod. Today we meet Dilys the cockerpoo and Aneira and her tortoises.

programme.title: Shwshaswyn
programme.desc: Mae pawb angen ffrindiau i'w codi weithiau, ac heddiw mae Fflwff yn rhannu jam blasus gyda Seren a'r Capten! Everyone needs a good friend to lift them - Fflwff cheers friends up with jam!

programme.title: Stiw
programme.desc: Mae Elsi'n drist, felly mae Stiw'n penderfynu bod yn glown er mwyn codi ei chalon. After hearing about circuses from Mr Siriol, Stiw becomes a clown, and tries to cheer up a sad Elsi.

programme.title: Dathlu 'Da Dona
programme.desc: Heddiw, bydd Elsi yn cael parti ffair haf gyda Cadi o Ahoi! Today, Elsi will be having a summer fair party with Cadi from Ahoi!

programme.title: Patrol Pawennau
programme.desc: Mae rap Twrchyn yn denu cynulleidfa annisgwyl - haid o ystlumod. Twrchyn's rap draws an unexpected crowd - a colony of bats.

programme.title: Y Diwrnod Mawr
programme.desc: Mae Saga wedi cyfansoddi can newydd sbon i roi syrpreis i Tadcu ar ei benblwydd. Saga's going to surprise her grandfather with a brand new song she's composed specially for his birthday.

programme.title: Caru Canu
programme.desc: Hwiangerdd draddodiadol i helpu suo plant bach i gysgu. A traditional lullaby to help little ones fall asleep.

programme.title: Twm Twrch
programme.desc: Mae Twm Twrch a'i fam yn edrych ymlaen i fynd a'u dyfais i'r gystadleuaeth wyddonol - ond yn anffodus mae 'na ddamwain! There's a device, a Science Competition, and an accidental breakage!

programme.title: Bendibwmbwls
programme.desc: Mae Ben Dant ar antur newydd i ailgylchu a throi sbwriel yn sbeshal, a gwastraff yn gampwaith. Today, Ben Dant will be joining pupils at Ysgol Y Traeth to create excellent treasure.

programme.title: Crawc a'i Ffrindiau
programme.desc: Mae Dyl yn ennill y fraint o fod yn Chîff am y dydd ac yn penderfynu difetha cerflun Crawc. Dyl wins Chiff's offer of being Chiff for a day and proposes to deface the statue of Crawc.

programme.title: Deian a Loli
programme.desc: Mae Mam eisiau taflu Terariwm Dad, ond ma'r efeilliaid yn benderfynol o achub y byd bach. Mum wants to throw away Dad's Terrarium, but the twins are determined to save the little habitat.

programme.title: Odo
programme.desc: Cartwn hyfryd am gwdihw bach o'r enw Odo a'i ffrindiau yn y goedwig. Lovely cartoon about a little owl called Odo and his woodland friends.

programme.title: Pablo
programme.desc: Mae gan Pablo ei ffordd ei hun o weld y byd, ac mae'n gallu bod yn ddi-amynedd. Heddiw, nid yw eisiau disgwyl i'r pwdin fod yn barod. Pablo doesn't want to wait for a blancmange to set!

programme.title: Annibendod
programme.desc: Mae Bochau wedi cael llond bol ar fwyta bresych, ac felly'n codi pac ac yn mynd ar ei wyliau i Fferm Ty Mawr! Bochau is fed up with eating cabbage all night and day and heads for the farm!

programme.title: Pentre Papur Pop
programme.desc: Ar yr antur popwych heddiw mae'r ffrindiau'n cael gorymdaith i ddathu ei cyfeillgarwch! On today's poptastic adventure, the friends are having a parade to celebrate their friendship.

programme.title: Sigldigwt
programme.desc: Mae Gwesty Sigldigwt ar agor! Heddiw cawn gwrdd â llygod bach a Gwen a'i neidr. Gwesty Sigldigwt is open! Today we meet some little mice and Gwen and her snake.

programme.title: Shwshaswyn
programme.desc: Y tro hwn - cyfle i'r Capten hwylio, i Fflwff ysgwyd gyda'r gwair ac i Seren ddod o hyd i ddarn diddorol o raff. A chance for the Captain to go sailing, and for Fflwff and Seren to play.

programme.title: Anifeiliaid Bach y Byd
programme.desc: Dewch ar antur gyda ni i gwrdd ac anifeiliaid bach y byd, ac yn y rhaglen hon byddwn yn dod i nabod yr arth wen a'r mircat. In this programme, we get to know the polar bear and the meercat.

programme.title: Jen a Jim a'r Cywiadur
programme.desc: Mae Cyw, Jangl a Llew yn paratoi picnic yn yr ardd ond yn anffodus, mae Cyw'n crio'n ddi-baid.Tybed pam? Cyw is crying so Jen and Jim travel the world to find out what's wrong with her.

programme.title: Teulu Ni
programme.desc: Mae Elliw wedi mynd i'r ysbyty ac mae Dylan a'i frodyr yn cael syniad o sut i roi croeso mawr iddi pan fydd hi'n dod adref. Dylan and his brothers welcome Elliw home from hospital.

programme.title: Amser Maith Maith Yn Ol
programme.desc: Heddiw, ma na brysurdeb mawr yn llys Llywelyn. Today there's a battle and an injured soldier is brought to the Court. Grwgyn the servant and Non the Maid look after Iestyn the soldier.

programme.title: Newyddion S4C
programme.desc: Newyddion S4C a'r Tywydd. S4C News and Weather.

programme.title: Ein Llwybrau Celtaidd
programme.desc: Tro ma, awn i Wicklow, Chill Mhantáin i ddechrau, ac yn ail ran y bennod, daw'r teulu nôl i'w cartre cyntaf yma yng Nghymru a glanio yn Sir Benfro. This time: Wicklow and Pembrokeshire. [SL]

programme.title: Heno

programme.title: Anifeiliaid Bach y Byd

programme.title: Crawc a'i Ffrindiau

programme.title: Amser Maith Maith yn ôl

programme.title: Y Doniolis

programme.title: Ar Goll yn Oz

programme.title: Parti

programme.title: Olobobs
programme.desc: Mae hi'n fore o haf ond mae Tib yn deffro'n ysu am gael sledio, ond mae wedi siomi pan mae'n darganfod ei fod wedi breuddwydio'r eira! Tib wakes one summer morning wanting to go sledging!

programme.title: Digbi Draig
programme.desc: Mae Betsi a'r Newidliwiwr yn troi Digbi'n goch fel ei arwr Gruffudd Goch yn y gobaith y bydd yn medru hedfan. Betsi and her Spectrumorph turn Digbi red like his hero Gruffudd Goch.

programme.title: Byd Tad-cu
programme.desc: Mae Ela'n holi 'Pam bod fy mol yn rymblan?', ac mae Tad-cu'n adrodd stori am bentre' Uwch Bentre' Bol Boliach. After Ela asks why does her stomach rumble? Tadcu tells another unusual story.

programme.title: Twt
programme.desc: Mae Pero, cath yr Harbwr Feistr, ar goll ac mae pawb yn ceisio eu gorau glas i ddod o hyd iddo. Pero, the Harbourmaster's cat is missing. Everyone's on the lookout for him but where is he?

programme.title: Cacamwnci
programme.desc: Mae Cacamwnci nôl gyda chymeriadau newydd fel Iestyn Ymestyn, Tesni Trwsio Popeth, Dani Rheolaeth, a'r hen ffefrynnau: Plismon Preis, Vanessa drws nesa a Delyth Dylwythen. Cacamwnci is back!

programme.title: New: Yr Whws
programme.desc: Mae'r Whws yn darganfod olion traed MAWR ac ma' nhw eisiau gwybod i ba greadur anhygoel maen nhw'n perthyn. The Woohoos discover some BIG muddy footprints footprints - who do they belong to?

programme.title: Sion y Chef
programme.desc: Mae Siôn yn paratoi salad Eidalaidd ond yna mae diflaniad mochyn Magi'n denu ei sylw. Siôn gets ingredients together for a classic Italian salad but is distracted when Magi's pig escapes.

programme.title: Sam Tan
programme.desc: Mae Norman yn awyddus i gael sgwp ar y papur lleol, ond fel arfer ma pethau'n mynd o chwith!! Norman is keen to get a scoop in the local paper but, as usual, things go wrong!!

programme.title: Octonots
programme.desc: Wrth blymio i'r dyfnfor du, mae criw o Fwydod Tanio yn ymosod ar yr Octonots. While diving down to the Midnight Zone, the Octonauts are attacked by bomber worms.

programme.title: New: Help Llaw
programme.desc: Mae car Catrin wedi torri lawr ar y ffordd i'r dosbarth ioga, felly ffwrdd a Harri i'w helpu hi a Rosalie. Catrin's car has broken down on the way to her yoga class - she needs help please!

programme.title: Cymylaubychain
programme.desc: Mae'n swnllyd iawn yn y nen heddiw. Pwy neu beth sy'n gyfrifol? It's very noisy today. Who or what is making the noise?

programme.title: Digbi Draig
programme.desc: Mae Betsi'n gadael ei hylif swyn dan ofal Digbi a Cochyn wrth iddi hi fynd i chwilio am y cynhwysyn olaf. Betsi leaves Digbi and Cochyn looking after a magic potion. That's a mistake!

programme.title: Caru Canu a Stori
programme.desc: Hoffai ffrindiau Deryn y Bwn fynd ar eu gwyliau ond does gan neb arian. Mae angen cynllun! The Bitten Bird's friends would love to go on holiday: time to think up a moneymaking scheme!

programme.title: Abadas
programme.desc: Mae angen dau air i ddisgrifio'r ddelwedd. Tybed pwy gaiff ei ddewis i fynd i chwilio am yr 'esgid rholio', Seren, Hari neu Ela? What will the word be and who will go on the adventure?

programme.title: Sbarc
programme.desc: Cyfres wyddoniaeth i blant bach gyda Tudur Phillips a'i ddau ffrind, Sbarc y gwyddonydd a Nef y Ditectif Natur. Pre-school science series with Tudur Phillips and his two friends.

programme.title: Y Tralalas
programme.desc: Mae Bop eisiau rhywbeth i ginio felly mae'r Tralalas yn mynd i'r archfarchnad i siopa. Bop wants something for lunch so the Tralalas visit the supermarket for supplies.

programme.title: Blero yn Mynd i Ocido
programme.desc: Wedi cael llond bol ar wneud ei jig-so dinosor mae Blero'n mynd i Ocido ac yn cael gwneud rhywbeth llawer mwy difyr! Blero is bored with his dino-jigsaw. Can he find something better to do?

programme.title: Jambori
programme.desc: Ymunwch â Jam ar daith llawn synau, cerddoriaeth a lluniau, gyda hwyaid yn dawnsio yn y bath, drws hudol yn y parc a chath yn coginio cacen. Welcome to a new series of Jamborî.

programme.title: Joni Jet
programme.desc: Mae'r amgueddfa'n ddiflas yn ôl Joni, tan bod Beti Bowen yn ceisio dwyn DNA'r mamoth! The museum is boring according to Joni, until Beti Bowen comes to try to steal the DNA of the mammoth!

programme.title: Dal Dy Ddannedd
programme.desc: Timau o Ysgol Ystalyfera sy'n ymuno â Pwdryn a Melys i chwarae llond trol o gemau lliwgar! Teams from Ysgol Ystalyfera join Pwdryn and Melys to play a series of candyland themed games.

programme.title: Olobobs
programme.desc: Mae'r Olobobs yn gwneud Oct-hosanau i helpu codi calon Bobl gyda sioe bypedau arbennig iawn.The Olobobs make Socktopuss to help cheer Bobble up with a very special puppet show.

programme.title: Digbi Draig
programme.desc: Mae 'na gyffro tan gwyllt yn y gyfres animeiddio hon i blant meithrin am ddraig fach o'r enw Digbi. Animation for youngsters about a dragon called Digbi - this time, fireworks fun!

programme.title: Byd Tad-cu
programme.desc: Ar ôl gweld twrch daear yn yr ardd, mae Jamal yn holi, 'Pam bod twrch daear yn byw o dan y ddaear?'. After seeing a mole in the garden, Jamal asks 'Why do moles live underground'?

programme.title: Twt
programme.desc: Mae 'na swn rhyfedd iawn yn yr harbwr heddiw - swn rhywun yn canu - neu'n ceisio canu, o leia'! There are some funny sounds at the harbour today. Someone's trying to sing!

programme.title: Cacamwnci
programme.desc: Mae Cacamwnci nôl gyda chymeriadau newydd fel Iestyn Ymestyn, Tesni Trwsio Popeth, Dani Rheolaeth, a'r hen ffefrynnau: Plismon Preis, Vanessa drws nesa a Delyth Dylwythen. Cacamwnci is back!

programme.title: Yr Whws

programme.title: Sion y Chef
programme.desc: Mae'r gaeaf yn golygu bod anifeiliaid gwyllt yn brin o fwyd, felly mae Siôn ac Izzy'n cynnig helpu. When a cold winter makes food very scarce for the local wildlife Sion and Izzy help out.

programme.title: Sam Tan
programme.desc: Rhaid i Brif Swyddog Steel gastio Norman yn ei sioe gerdd. Mae Norman yn achosi problemau o'r funud gynta - diolch i'r drefn bod Sam Tan wrth law. Steel casts Norman in his new musical!

programme.title: Octonots
programme.desc: Pan gaiff malwod sy'n syrffio eu hysgubo ymaith i'r môr, rhaid i Dela a'r Octonots eu hachub. When surfing snails are swept out to sea, it's up to Dela and the Octonauts to save them.

programme.title: Help Llaw

programme.title: 100 Years of Horror
programme.desc: 1998. Documentary. Directed by Ted Newson. King of Horror, Christopher Lee, takes us on a frightening journey from the earliest horror movies to modern day slashers! [S]

programme.title: Cellar Club with Caroline Munro
programme.desc: Caroline Munro is joined by otherworldly beings, as she takes a look at next week's thrilling films. [S]

programme.title: Hammer House of Mystery and Suspense
programme.desc: Last Video and Testament. 1984. Stars Deborah Raffin & David Langton. A wealthy businessman about to undergo surgery has a surprise in store for his wife and her lover. [S]

programme.title: Just Like Heaven
programme.desc: 1930. Tobey Mitchell, a young Parisian balloon vendor with ambitions to become a designer of pageants, guards his stand in the Street of the Poor.

programme.title: Look At Life Fings Are Getting Smaller
programme.desc: 1964. A fascinating look at how everything is being reduced in size to fit in with the new compact age.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: Jed Saves Drydale's Marriage. 1963. Stars Buddy Ebsen, Raymond Bailey & Irene Ryan. Drysdale's marriage is threatened by a misunderstanding when he looks for a housekeeper while his wife is away. [S]

programme.title: Stagecoach West
programme.desc: Fork in the Road. Western starring Wayne Rogers, Richard Eyer & Robert Bray. While on their regular stagecoach run Simon and Davey Kane pick up a man walking by the road in the middle of nowhere. [S]

programme.title: The Hostage
programme.desc: 1956. Drama. A South American revolutionary is facing death for murder but the President's daughter in London is taken hostage. Starring Ron Randell. [S]

programme.title: Shoot to Kill
programme.desc: 1947. Crime drama. Directed by William Berke and starring Russell Wade, Luana Walters and Edmund MacDonald. A woman marries a corrupt D.A. to get evidence to help on a recent murder. [S]

programme.title: Star Performance: A Place Full of Strangers
programme.desc: 1955. Drama. Director: Roy Kellino. Stars Dick Powell & Dina Merrill. An overworked businessman tries to escape from his hectic life and goes on a surreal bus trip to 'Meadville'.

programme.title: Recoil
programme.desc: 1953. Directed by John Gilling. Filmed at Alliance Studios, Twickenham. Stars Elizabeth Sellars, Kieron Moore. A jeweller's daughter seeks revenge on a gang that robbed and killed her father. [S]

programme.title: A Cry From The Streets
programme.desc: 1958. Drama starring Max Bygraves, Barbara Murray and Colin Petersen. A welfare worker becomes emotionally involved with a group of homeless children. Music by Larry Adler. [S]

programme.title: Look At Life The Golden West
programme.desc: 1964. A glance at the hidden wealth of Cornwall - of its tin, granite and stone; with a look at the declining tin mining industry and how unemployment can be helped by the development of new industry.

programme.title: The Brothers
programme.desc: The Guilt Beneath the Gingerbread. 1974. Stars Richard Easton, Bill Treacher & Timothy Carlton. Brian finds himself alone to answer police questioning. Meanwhile, unrest at the depot continues. [S]

programme.title: Ride in the Whirlwind
programme.desc: 1966. Western. Directed by Monte Hellman. Stars Jack Nicholson, Cameron Mitchell & Millie Perkins. Three cowboys are pursued by a relentless posse after being mistaken for a gang of outlaws. [S]

programme.title: A Lifetime Ago with The Baim Collection
programme.desc: Behave Yourself. 1962. An amusing guide on how to act in public, based on Emily Post's Book of Manners.

programme.title: Operation Stogie
programme.desc: 1959. Comedy. Director: Ernest Morris. Stars John Hewer, Anton Rodgers & Susan Stephen. Two cadets are set an outrageous and wacky initiation test to prove their suitability for officer training. [S]

programme.title: Strange But True
programme.desc: Bonnybridge/Painless Penny. 1994. Michael Aspel delves into supernatural stories, including reports of UFO sightings in a Scottish town and a young girl who predicted the death of her grandma. [S]

programme.title: Z-Cars
programme.desc: Scot Free. 1976. Stars John Blackburn, Rupen Budhdeo, Douglas Fielding & Pat Gorman. Two boys are trapped in a disused mine, but why is their friend terrified of going to the police? [S]

programme.title: Manhunt
programme.desc: Little Man, What Next? Part 2. 1970. Stars Alfred Lynch, Robert Hardy & John Savident. Gratz continues to be interrogated. Meanwhile, Nina, Jimmy and Vincent receive extraction instructions. [S]

programme.title: Maigret
programme.desc: My Friend Maigret. 2001. Stars Bruno Cremer, Michael Morris & Marc Chapiteau. Maigret visits a small island where a man who claimed to have been Maigret's friend has been murdered. [S]

programme.title: The Place of the Dead
programme.desc: 1997. Adventure. Directed by Suri Krishnamma. Stars Greg Wise, Simon Dutton & Dougray Scott. A group of soldiers on a British Army expedition attempt to navigate an unexplored Malaysian gully.

programme.title: The Place of the Dead
programme.desc: 1997. Adventure. Directed by Suri Krishnamma. Stars Greg Wise, Simon Dutton & Dougray Scott. A group of soldiers on a British Army expedition attempt to navigate an unexplored Malaysian gully.

programme.title: On the Yard
programme.desc: 1978. Drama. Directed by Raphael D. Silver. Stars John Heard, Richard Bright & Mike Kellin. In prison, a bookish con artist struggles to adjust to the intricate social order of the prison system. [S]

programme.title: The Broken Melody
programme.desc: 1934. Directed by Bernard Vorhaus. Paul Verlaine, a struggling composer (John Garrick) is supported by Germaine (Merle Oberon) who is secretly in love with him. [S]

programme.title: Lena Rivers
programme.desc: 1932. Drama starring Charlotte Henry, Morgan Galloway and Beryl Mercer. Young Lena, born out of wedlock, goes to live with a rich uncle, but his wife and daughter don't like her one bit. [S]

programme.title: Sherlock Holmes
programme.desc: The Case of the Shoeless Engineer. 1954. Starring: Ronald Howard, Howard Marion-Crawford & Archie Duncan. Sherlock Holmes and Dr. Watson encounter an injured man carrying an unconscious woman. [S]

programme.title: The Trial of Madame X
programme.desc: 1948. Drama. Directed by Paul England. Stars Mara Russell-Tavernan, Frank Hawkins & Edward Leslie. A philandering wife thrown out of home by her husband later finds herself accused of murder. [S]

programme.title: Jack London
programme.desc: 1943. Adventure. Directed by Alfred Santell. Stars Michael O'Shea, Susan Hayward and Virginia Mayo. Biopic of the thrill-seeking writer and his travels in the late 19th and early 20th Century. [S]

programme.title: Star Performance: One Way Out
programme.desc: 1955. Drama. Directed by Roy Kellino. Stars Ida Lupino & Scott Forbes. A wealthy woman separates from her husband and moves to an apartment in New York but soon finds herself trapped inside.

programme.title: Suspect
programme.desc: 1960. Drama. Directed by Roy Boulting and John Boulting. Stars Tony Britton, Virginia Maskell, Peter Cushing. A young scientist's pioneering work attracts the attention of the authorities. [S]

programme.title: The End of the Road
programme.desc: 1954. Drama. Directed by Wolf Rilla. Unhappy with enforced retirement, Mick-mack takes a lesser job at the factory, which creates strains within the family. Starring Finlay Currie & Duncan Lamont. [S]

programme.title: Lady in the Fog
programme.desc: 1952. Mystery. Directed by Sam Newfield. Stars Cesar Romero, Lois Maxwell & Bernadette O'Farrell. A woman enlists the help of an American journalist to solve the mystery of her brother's death. [S]

programme.title: Crown Court
programme.desc: Further Charges - Part 1. 1974. Stars Bernard Archard, Raymond Mason & Claire Neilson. Peter Elgar has been charged with attempting to obtain money by deception and also faces a charge of arson. [S]

programme.title: Crown Court
programme.desc: Further Charges - Part 2. 1974. Stars Barrie Cookson, David Ashford & Richard Wilson. Peter Elgar's former business partner Gerald Stroud is called as a surprise witness. [S]

programme.title: Crown Court
programme.desc: Further Charges - Part 3. 1974. Stars Bernard Archard & Aimée Delamain. Peter Elgar is questioned about a drum of petrol found in his shop, but what will the verdict be at the end of the trial? [S]

programme.title: The Card
programme.desc: 1952. Comedy. Director: Ronald Neame. Stars Alec Guinness, Glynis Johns & Valerie Hobson. A man finds ways to rise through the ranks in business and social standing, some honest, some not. [S]

programme.title: Tell Me Another
programme.desc: 1976. True Stories About Working and Holidaying Overseas. Personal anecdotes as told to Dick Hills. This episode stars Jimmy Jewel, Jimmy Logan and Barbara Windsor. [S]

programme.title: Those British Faces
programme.desc: 1993. Documentary series that acts as a tribute to the greats of British cinema. Narrated by Richard Todd, looking at the life of James Justice Robertson. [S]

programme.title: The Cheaters
programme.desc: A Question of Murder. 1961. Stars John Ireland & Viola Keats. Gloria attempts to have her father declared dead as he has been missing for seven years. Hunter is assigned to find out the truth. [S]

programme.title: The Brothers
programme.desc: The Devil You Know. 1976. Stars Richard Easton & Colin Baker. The Hammond board is evenly divided about Kirkman's offer. The final decision rests with Merroney. But can Sir Neville influence him? [S]

programme.title: Travelling Man

programme.title: Masha And The Bear
programme.desc: The Mystery Guest: Somebody terribly scary has climbed into the house of Penguin and made a terrible mess there! Bear rushes down to Antarctica to help, and Masha tags along with him. (S5 Ep22)

programme.title: Masha And The Bear
programme.desc: Princess Or Dragon?: A snow tower? Check. A group of friends? Check. Sounds like a recipe for a fun game! Even Bear joined Masha, Rosie, and Penguin. But who will be the Princess? (S5 Ep23)

programme.title: Masha And The Bear
programme.desc: Happily Feather After: Spring has dawned, the birds have arrived! But a pigeon settles in the birdhouse near Bear's house, and Masha makes him her new pet. (S5 Ep24)

programme.title: Masha And The Bear
programme.desc: Fast And Furrryous: Bear has made a new purchase: he's bought a motorcycle! Now as a cool biker, he plans on impressing She-Bear, but she doesn't seem to like it very much. (S5 Ep25)

programme.title: Baby Born
programme.desc: Lucky Dog! / Snow!: Carla has a surprise for Emma: Lucky Dog! He's such a good doggy. Emma loves playing with her new friend. Carla and Conrad are so excited. (S1 Ep4)

programme.title: Baby Born
programme.desc: Ice Skating! / Horse Riding!: Carla and Conrad have surprised each other with new ice skates. Emma wants to ice skate too but she first needs to learn how to walk with her new Duck walker. (S1 Ep5)

programme.title: The Miniwhats
programme.desc: At The Foot Of The Rainbow: Petula and Pamela set off on a magic pony in search of the treasure buried at the foot of the rainbow. (S1 Ep8)

programme.title: The Miniwhats
programme.desc: Little Yellow Riding Hood: Petula hasn't written her story for school, and it's due tomorrow. Ollie draws an old storybook and out pops Little Yellow Riding Hood, also known as Micheline. (S1 Ep9)

programme.title: The Miniwhats
programme.desc: The Generous Genie: Mustard's skateboard was confiscated after he crossed the street without looking. Cars are so lame... If only one could fly over them! Ollie draws a magic lamp. (S1 Ep10)

programme.title: Billy The Cowboy Hamster
programme.desc: Dandelion soup: After taking a swim in the river, Miss Goatie finds her stagecoach has gone missing. Impatient to see the new books in the library, the children decide to go in search of it. (S1 Ep7)

programme.title: Billy The Cowboy Hamster
programme.desc: The Dream-Catcher: Billy had bad dreams during the night and slept very badly. Seeing his friend so tired, JC offers to read him a story to help him get to sleep. (S1 Ep8)

programme.title: Billy The Cowboy Hamster
programme.desc: The Golden Waterfall: One very hot day, Billy sets off with JC and Suzie in search of the Golden Waterfall, the most beautiful place in the Grand Canyon in which to swim. (S1 Ep9)

programme.title: Billy The Cowboy Hamster
programme.desc: Old Jack's Cuckoo: Passing Jack's place, Billy, Suzie and Jean-Claude find the old vulture repainting his precious cuckoo clock. (S1 Ep10)

programme.title: Go! Go! Cory Carson
programme.desc: Blustery Beach Day: Follow the adventures of kid car Cory Carson as he navigates the winding roads of childhood with his friends and family in Bumperton hills. (S1 Ep33)

programme.title: PJ Masks

programme.title: PJ Masks
programme.desc: Robo-Wolf: The Wolfies want their own Robo-servant... but get more than they wish for! (S4 Ep36)

programme.title: PJ Masks
programme.desc: The Labours of Armadylan: Armadylan tries to fix a museum artefact without telling the PJ Masks. (S4 Ep37)

programme.title: PJ Masks
programme.desc: Lost in Space: Romeo wants to create the ultimate trap for the PJMasks - but accidentally turns the Flying Factory computer system hyper-intelligent - and hostile. (S4 Ep38)

programme.title: Dino Ranch
programme.desc: Luna Sees the Light: When the Dino Ranchers use lights to communicate with a deaf Parasaur, the baby dino uses them to guide her herd to safety in a snowstorm. (S2 Ep28)

programme.title: Dino Ranch
programme.desc: Sonny Daze: Sonny the Kid gets under Jon's skin when he cheats during a dino tournament. (S2 Ep29)

programme.title: Dino Ranch
programme.desc: Rebel's Wonderful Way: When Blitz tries to teach Rebel how to be Dino Rancher, he mistakenly pushes his little student to do things his way and puts Rebel in trouble. (S2 Ep30)

programme.title: Dino Ranch
programme.desc: Thunderin' Thundertot: When Thundertot crashes Clover and Min's sleepover in the Hatchery, Clover's plans for the night are interrupted by the rambunctious baby spinosaur. (S2 Ep31)

programme.title: Dino Ranch
programme.desc: Clara's Shortcut Rut: When Clara Tinhorn takes shortcuts on a Dino Ranch practice course, she lands her brothers in trouble and needs to put those skills to use. (S2 Ep32)

programme.title: Dino Ranch
programme.desc: Tall in the Saddle Drive: When a Brontosaur Leader gets separated from her herd, Dino Ranchers need to keep the herd from scattering until she can reunite with them and lead the migration. (S1 Ep51)
